-----
September 26-28, 2022
09:00 - 17:00
Dar-es-Salaam, Tanzania
-----

This workshop targets public health researchers and aims to accompany them in their journey towards Data Science. Looking forward to meeting you all on Monday!

# Venue

The workshop takes place at **Protea Hotel Dar es Salaam Courtyard** on Seaview Ocean Road. The conference room is **Nelson Hall**.

![](images/paste-67B4C38F.png)

# Before the workshop

1.  Fill out the online [pre-workshop questionnaire](https://timicodktest.smartforest.de/-/single/cac06e76b3e163e655e49626f8129de8f55a8035ced54f15bc4c6cf527dba8a7?st=DnBRz677PIYh33ML0rE1amWzyhCIYPGFQnmZ6AAou8nJFyikWN6nLM5i3G4I0YZN)

2.  If you have not done it yet, please go through the following five steps (about 30 minutes).

    a.  [Install R](https://thaliehln.github.io/ds4ph/r_setup.html#sec-R-installation)

    b.  [Install and setup RStudio Desktop](https://thaliehln.github.io/ds4ph/r_setup.html#sec-RStudio-installation)

    c.  [Install Quarto](https://thaliehln.github.io/ds4ph/r_setup.html#sec-Quarto-installation)
    
    d.  [Install the rmarkdown R package](https://thaliehln.github.io/ds4ph/r_setup.html#sec-rmarkdown-installation)

    e.  [Create a GitHub account](https://thaliehln.github.io/ds4ph/github_setup.html#sec-GitHub-account-creation)

    f.  [Install GitHub Desktop](https://thaliehln.github.io/ds4ph/github_setup.html#sec-GitHub-Desktop-installation)

::: callout-note
* All software used in this workshop are free.
* If you have any difficulties with the installation, support can be provided on the first day of the workshop before the first session or during breaks.
:::

::: callout-important
For those who have already been introduced to Git, R/RStudio and RMarkdown, note that you need to additionally install Quarto for this workshop.
:::
